
                            
                            <p><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/06/234513g7lllxqy76cxnqw8.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/06/234513g7lllxqy76cxnqw8.jpg">刚刚进全民生活做签到任务，无意中点到了额度，一看有两个红色的文字，点进去就看到额度增加了，接了个验证码提交，就从5W提升到6W了<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/default/titter.gif" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/default/titter.gif"> <br> </p><p class="pl">民生没啥用</p><p></p>
